description: Read or write files from the computer that runs n8n

essential_properties.name: fileSelector
essential_properties.description: Specify a file's path or path pattern to read multiple files. Always use forward-slashes for path separator even on Windows.

essential_properties.name: fileName
essential_properties.description: Path and name of the file that should be written. Also include the file extension.

common_operations.name: Read File(s) From Disk
common_operations.description: Retrieve one or more files from the computer that runs n8n

common_operations.name: Write File to Disk
common_operations.description: Create a binary file on the computer that runs n8n
